mapper.select: SELECT pr_uid "uid", pr_title title, pr_photo photo, pr_content content FROM premiere ORDER BY pr_uid DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{pageRows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO premiere (pr_title, pr_photo, pr_content) VALUES (#{title}, #{photo}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT pr_uid uid, pr_title title, pr_photo photo, pr_content content FROM premiere WHERE pr_uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM premiere WHERE pr_uid IN (${item})
